item.title: Your Free 100 Envelope Challenge Printable to Save $5,050
item.description: If you’ve ever wanted a simple, hands-on way to save a serious chunk of cash, a 100 envelope challenge printable is your ticket to stashing away exactly $5,050. The whole idea is to turn saving money into a kind of game by using a tracker or labels numbered 1 to 100. You match the dollar amount to the number on the envelope and stuff it inside. What Is the 100 Envelope Challenge # The 100 Envelope Challenge is a savings method that went viral for good reasonâ€”it transforms the vague idea of “saving more” into a physical, hands-on activity.
